content.rendered:
Directed by Avinash Das.

Written by Avinash Das.

Cast Sanjay Mishra(VC). Pankaj Tripathi(Rangeela (as Pankaj Tripathy)). Swara Bhaskar(Anarkali). Mayur More(Anwar). Ishtiyak Khan(Hiraman). Shobhna Bharadwaj(VC’s Wife). Vijay Kumar(Inspector Bulbul Singh). Monika Chowdhury(Sanskrit Women). Vishwa Bhanu(Cop). Ramkumar Singh(Journalist SN Mishra).Suman Patel. Harsh Hansraj(Delhi Boy). Kappil Shah(Mastram)

Language Hindi.

Producers Sohail Abbas. Jitender. Priya Kapur. Sandip Kapur. Mohammad Mubashshir.

Production Promodome Films.
